IndexedDataPool.name: fullDataPool
IndexedDataPool.Description: Sample data pool with full functionality.

Name.Description: The torque applied to reaction wheel 1.
The torque applied to reaction wheel 2.
The torque applied to reaction wheel 3.
The torque applied to reaction wheel 4.

TimeStamp.Description: The OBS Clock to be used to time-stamp the data pool values.

IndexedDatabase.name: parDB
IndexedDatabase.Description: A sample database with intermediate level of robustness against illegal accesses to database parameters. This database contains real-typed gains.

FSM.name: Nominal_FSM
FSM.Description: FSM for the sample application class. Top-level FSM that controls nominal mode operation. To each state of this FSM, a nominal operational model is associated. To each state, another FSM is attached that implements the FSM logic of the corresponding nominal mode.

NestedFsmActivatorWithExitCheck.name: SAM_FsmState
NestedFsmActivatorWithExitCheck.Description: FsmState component for the SAM mode.

Custom.name: SCM_FsmState
Custom.Description: Sample FsmState application class. This FsmState models the SCM mode logic.

InitAction.Description: Initialization action for the sample FsmState application class.

TerminationCheck.Description: Termination action for the sample FsmState application class.

Custom.name: OCM_FsmState
Custom.Description: Sample FsmState application class. This FsmState models the OCM mode logic.

InitAction.Description: Initialization action for the sample FsmState application class.

TerminationCheck.Description: Termination action for the sample FsmState application class.

FromFsmEvent.name: SAM_to_OCM
FromFsmEvent.Description: FsmEvent component triggering transition from SAM to OCM mode.

FromFsmEvent.name: OCM_to_SAM
FromFsmEvent.Description: FsmEvent component triggering transition from OCM to SAM mode.

FromFsmEvent.name: SCM_to_SAM
FromFsmEvent.Description: FsmEvent component triggering transition from SCM to SAM mode.

FromFsmEvent.name: SAM_to_SCM
FromFsmEvent.Description: FsmEvent component triggering transition from SAM to SCM mode.

FromFsmEvent.name: SCM_to_OCM
FromFsmEvent.Description: FsmEvent component triggering transition from SCM to OCM mode.

FromFsmEvent.name: OCM_to_SCM
FromFsmEvent.Description: FsmEvent component triggering transition from OCM to SCM mode.

FSM.name: SBY_FSM
FSM.Description: FSM for the sample application. This FSM models the SBY mode logic.

Custom.name: SBY_PreSeparation
Custom.Description: Sample FsmState application class. FsmState component for the SBY preseparation mode.

InitAction.Description: Reset the telemetry manager, reset the telecommand manager, and reset the parameter database.

TerminationCheck.Description: Terminate when the separation is detected.

Custom.name: SBY_PostSeparation
Custom.Description: Sample FsmState application class. FsmState component for the SBY postseparation mode.

InitAction.Description: Perform actions to be done upon detection of separation.

ExitAction.Description: Perform action to be done just before exiting the this mode.

DummyFsmState.name: END
DummyFsmState.Description: Dummy FsmState component for the end state of an FSM.

FSM.name: SAM_FSM
FSM.Description: FSM for the sample application. This FSM models the SAM mode logic.

UnstableFsmState.name: SAM_SunAcquisition
UnstableFsmState.Description: FsmState component for the SAM-SunAcquisition submode.

DummyFsmState.name: SAM_SunPointing
DummyFsmState.Description: FsmState component for the SAM-SunPointing submode.

FSM.name: OCM_FSM
FSM.Description: FSM for the sample application. This FSM models the OCM mode logic.

UnstableFsmState.name: OCM_Slewing
UnstableFsmState.Description: FsmState component for the OCM-Slewing submode.

DummyFsmState.name: OCM_Pointing
DummyFsmState.Description: FsmState component for the OCM-Pointing submode.

DummyFsmState.name: OCM_Thrusting
DummyFsmState.Description: FsmState component for the OCM-Thrusting submode.

FSM.name: SCM_FSM
FSM.Description: FSM for the sample application. This FSM models the SCM mode logic.

DummyFsmState.name: SCM_Slewing
DummyFsmState.Description: FsmState component for the SCM-Slewing submode.

DummyFsmState.name: SCM_Pointing
DummyFsmState.Description: FsmState component for the SCM-Pointing submode.

DummyFsmState.name: SCM_Scanning
DummyFsmState.Description: FsmState component for the SCM-Scanning submode.

FSM.name: SM_FSM
FSM.Description: FSM for the sample application class. Top-level FSM that controls survival mode operation.

Custom.name: SM_PreSeparation
Custom.Description: Sample FsmState application class. FsmState component for the survival mode pre-separation submode.

InitAction.Description: Reset the telemetry manager, reset the telecommand manager.

TerminationCheck.Description: Terminate when the separation is detected.

UnstableFsmState.name: SM_PostSeparation
UnstableFsmState.Description: FsmState component for the survival mode post-separation submode.

UnstableFsmState.name: SM_SunAcquisition
UnstableFsmState.Description: FsmState component for survival mode sun-acquisition submode.

DummyFsmState.name: SM_SunPointing
DummyFsmState.Description: FsmState component for survival mode sun-pointing submode.

FromFsmEvent.name: SM_PreToPost
FromFsmEvent.Description: FsmEvent component to trigger transition from SM pre- to post-seperation.

FSM.name: FDIR_FSM
FSM.Description: FSM for the sample application. This FSM controls FDIR operation.

Custom.name: AFS
Custom.Description: Sample application class. FsmState component representing the AFS state of the FDIR FSM.

InitAction.Description: Disable all reconfigurations; disable all telecommands to change the enable/disable status of the reconfiguration managers.

ExitAction.Description: Enable all reconfigurations; enable all telecommands to change the enable/disable status of the reconfiguration managers.

DummyFsmState.name: AFO
DummyFsmState.Description: FsmState component representing the AFO state of the FDIR FSM.

FromFsmEvent.name: AFS_to_AFO
FromFsmEvent.Description: FsmEvent component to trigger a transition from the AFS to AFO state of the FDIR FSM.

FromFsmEvent.name: AFO_to_AFS
FromFsmEvent.Description: FsmEvent component to trigger a transition from the AFO to AFS state of the FDIR FSM.

Input.Description: The first (and only) input of the control block is linked to the speed of reaction wheel 1.

Output.Description: The first (and only) output of the control block is linked to the torque of reaction wheel 1.

Parameter.Description: The single parameter that is used by the control block.

Custom.name: contBlock_1
Custom.Description: Sample control block number 1. This control block has one input (the speed of reaction wheel 1), one output (the torque of reaction wheel 1), and one parameter (the gain K1).

Input.Description: The first (and only) input of the control block is linked to the speed of reaction wheel 2.

Output.Description: The first (and only) output of the control block is linked to the torque of reaction wheel 1.

Parameter.Description: The single parameter that is used by the control block.

Custom.name: contBlock_2
Custom.Description: Sample control block number 2. This control block has one input (the speed of reaction wheel 2), one output (the torque of reaction wheel 2), and one parameter (the gain K2).

Input.Description: The first (and only) input of the control block is linked to the speed of reaction wheel 3.

Output.Description: The first (and only) output of the control block is linked to the torque of reaction wheel 3.

Parameter.Description: The single parameter that is used by the control block.

Custom.name: contBlock_3
Custom.Description: Sample control block number 3. This control block has one input (the speed of reaction wheel 3), one output (the torque of reaction wheel 3), and one parameter (the gain K3).

Input.Description: The first (and only) input of the control block is linked to the speed of reaction wheel 4.

Output.Description: The first (and only) output of the control block is linked to the torque of reaction wheel 3.

Parameter.Description: The single parameter that is used by the control block.

Custom.name: contBlock_4
Custom.Description: Sample control block number 4. This control block has one input (the speed of reaction wheel 4), one output (the torque of reaction wheel 4), and one parameter (the gain K4).

DummyObsClock.name: obsClk
DummyObsClock.Description: The OBS Clock of the sample application.

PUSEventRepository.name: evtRep
PUSEventRepository.Description: PUS event repository for the sample application.

DummyTracer.name: tracer
DummyTracer.Description: The tracer component of the sample application.

PUSDumpMemoryAbsolute.name: tc_9
PUSDumpMemoryAbsolute.Description: Sample PUS memory dump telecommand with absolute addresses.

PUSDumpMemoryOffset.name: tc_10
PUSDumpMemoryOffset.Description: Sample PUS memory dump telecommand with offset.

PUSMemoryLoadAbsolute.name: tc_11
PUSMemoryLoadAbsolute.Description: Sample PUS memory load telecommand with absolute addresses.

PUSMemoryLoadAbsolute.name: tc_12
PUSMemoryLoadAbsolute.Description: Sample PUS memory load telecommand with absolute addresses.

PUSMemoryLoadOffset.name: tc_13
PUSMemoryLoadOffset.Description: Sample PUS memory load telecommand with offset addresses.

PUSTelemetryPackets.Description: The PUS telemetry packets of the sample application.

PUSTcVerificationPacket.name: tm_3
PUSTcVerificationPacket.Description: A TC verification telemetry packet for the sample application.

PUSDataReportingPacket.name: tm_4
PUSDataReportingPacket.Description: A data reporting packet with large capacity for the sample application.

PUSDataReportingPacket.name: tm_5
PUSDataReportingPacket.Description: A data reporting packet with small capacity for the sample application.

MemoryDumpAbsolute.name: tm_6
MemoryDumpAbsolute.Description: A memory dump absolute telemetry packet for the sample application.

MemoryDumpOffset.name: tm_7
MemoryDumpOffset.Description: A memory dump offset telemetry packet for the sample application.

PUSTelemetryModeManager.name: tmModeMan
PUSTelemetryModeManager.Description: The PUS telemetry mode manager for the sample application.
